title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When using the New Package Wizard in the IDE, a confusing message is displayed.
EB: The New Package Wizard should display a clear and concise message that accurately guides the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new Java Project. 2. Select the project. 3. Use the New Package Wizard.
